edu.unh.cs.cs619.bulletzone.Singletons

Class UserTank

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.unh.cs.cs619.bulletzone.Singletons.UserTank

  • public class UserTank
extends java.lang.Object

    UserTank Class!

    The UserTank class is a singleton that gives everyone access to tankId and direction.
    Since:
    Halloween!
    Author:
    Justin Moore
